website_summaries.verdict: Engineered for safety, this sturdy plastic/stainless steel device holds food securely with minimal resistance.
pros: Features super-sharp, on-board blades (straight, wavy, julienne) instead of attachments
Blades lock onto base for safety
cons: Blade guard may warp the blade over time

customer_reviews.title: The cubing option is very poor. especially since the part left over in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth the money. I hoped that by spending a lot of money I would get a premium product but it does not work as well as it costs. I have tried with potatoes, butternut squash, cucumbers. The cubing option is very poor. especially since the part left over in the slicer is too big and it only cubes about half of what needs to be cubed. The rest, must be cubed the traditional way with a knife. I wish I had tried it right after I had bought it. It does not seem to give me the option to sent it back. DO NOT BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Chriss

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product twice now and I love it. I love that it is all in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product twice now and I love it. I love that it is all in 1. I would never use it because of all the fuss with all the parts, cleaning, use and unorganized storage. With this unit you just open the back protective blade door and put it in the dishwasher and it folds up nicely in 1 unit for storage. Love it! Once I had a good strategy (driest vegetables to most moist vegetables) I was able to get all my vegetable slicing for the week and clean up done in about 1 hour.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Schwabenbauer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived severely damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged and have not heard back from seller about a return- tried to file claim, but the action to file is not working. This arrived in a damaged (severely) box, and the slicer was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: kathart

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a PL8 Brand Mandoline (as advertised ): this is an Asian knockoff. Amazon should ban your marketing as it’s fraudulent (and illegal). I am contacting both Amazon and PL8 to let them know of your practices.
customer_reviews.author: C. ALM.

customer_reviews.title: Overall very happy. May be me
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy. May be me, but doesn't slice/cut all the product - lots left to hand slice. Also, be sure to wash immediately or veggie remains will dry on the blades and be hard to safely clean. Doesn't work well for cheese for me but great for veggies and fruit. Have not had good luck with the cubing feature so far but that was mostly for cheese. Wonderful slicing apple slices for drying.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cube
customer_reviews.text: The cubing function simply doesn’t work. You need to use a lot of force to cube hard foods which makes the mandoline unstable as you try to pound the food across the teeth. The hard food often gets stuck on the teeth halfway through. Soft foods like tomatoes get shredded and the juice goes everywhere. I bought this mandoline for the ability to cube foods. It slices great but I can buy a great slicing mandoline without the cubing function for much less.
customer_reviews.author: barbara a kozlosky

customer_reviews.title: Even a simple slicing for softer vegetables like bell peppers was complicated
customer_reviews.text: First of all this product showed up at my door used - with dried up pieces of vegetables stuck in it. Then I tried to use it and found it to be difficult for carrots and the julienne and cubing near impossible to use. Even a simple slicing for softer vegetables like bell peppers was complicated. I do not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kramer

customer_reviews.title: 100% quality
customer_reviews.text: kitchen knife king of the kitchen !!! 1/5 of the vegetables need to be processed with a knife. I will not risk recommending to friends. I do not regret the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: I love it, easy to use and to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love it, easy to use and to clean. Efficient for the slicing and for making cubes. My only remark is that it's difficult to go to the end of the vegetables with the protection and the cube are smaller than I thought they would be. But great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia J.

customer_reviews.title: No more fingernail clippings.  Or blood
customer_reviews.text: Gets pesky when you don't have a full receiver. Well built, otherwise. Safety features are great.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Safe and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Best and safest slicer for our kitchen It is sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good item but too expensive. The knife not so sharp and it wont cut all the fruit!
customer_reviews.author: eitan

customer_reviews.title: Great paper thin slices;))
customer_reviews.text: Like it Use for salad:)) very nice paper thinner slices .love it
customer_reviews.author: marzanna krysinska balazy

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool, but I don't like the safety feature, it doesn't work as designed when Cutting fries. It leaves a big piece of potato from going thru.
customer_reviews.author: thomas duffy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work the way the ads show you. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this product to work like the demo videos, but unfortunately it does not. You have to cut vegetables into the perfect size/shape to get the best fit in the holder and decent results- I might as well just chop the vegetables myself. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mandoline
customer_reviews.text: This mandoline lives up to the hype. Super sharp, easy to adjust for a variety of cutting results, and easy to clean. We'd waited a long time to find one for our kitchen, and I'm glad we settled on this one.
customer_reviews.author: granola_geek

customer_reviews.title: It's not the quality I expected. Work not very ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not the quality I expected. Work not very well with potatoes and carrot. I didnt sent it back because the freightcharges for these item cost me more than 50% of the prices for this item. Never anymore orders bij amazon.com usa.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch out!!!  It's SHARP!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Ripped right through everything I through at it. Worked like a champ. It's wide enough for almost any fruit or vegetable. It adjusts from one cut to another quite easily. And it's SHARP!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F. Leuschner

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a product that will last longer. Usable and safe.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a product that will last longer. Usable and safe.
customer_reviews.author: keren

customer_reviews.title: Works as described...but gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Took my finger tip right off on its first use...lol...not kidding...I’d still recommend it...but do yourself a favor and buy the gloves to go with it...the gloves are cheaper than the urgent care visit!
customer_reviews.author: Blair W Bogle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I sent it to my Sister who lives in another Country and did not work. Unfortunately I did not try it before I sent it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria J.Levin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very very hard to use this one, very messy in the kitchen and keeping alot of left overs from the vegetables. Very disappointed from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Oren V.

customer_reviews.title: NOT sharp
customer_reviews.text: Yes it does cubing (on potatoes) and it's sturdy but the main reason I bought it was to cube tomatoes but it doesn't work on tomatoes. The vertical blades are too dull to cut tomatoes and even the main horizontal blade is not very sharp. My 24 year old, beat up Borner mandolin cutter is sharper than my brand new PL8. One major design flaw is the vertical blades are too steep of an angle to cut - they should have a more gradual incline. Another problem is that you need to lift up the veggie over the vertical blade on the return, otherwise it mangles the food. Overall I'm quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Bytheway

customer_reviews.title: Dull blades
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a new mandolin with such dull blades.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Sansone

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad after a lot of research this is the mandoline ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad after a lot of research this is the mandoline we purchased it is perfect! It is well made and we love the cubing!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: A high quality kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality easy and safe to use. I always had problems getting equal slices and dices not with this excellent kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Braun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best mandolin I've ever used. Still have not cut myself on it!
customer_reviews.author: KellyV

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Finally I can scallop potatoes and onions and so much more. Love this
customer_reviews.author: nancy eagle

customer_reviews.title: Quickly Became an Essential Tool in my Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Dazzling and versatile. I almost look like I know what I'm doing when I use it. Maybe more than I needed, but cooking for me has to be fun or I lose interest quickly. I have a very small kitchen so this feels like it helps me in its efficient and elegant design. Really feels like top-of-the line. Blades are sharp and it makes quick work of any set-up. I like that it cubes, as well. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bolo Jungle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Much better and than the many cheaper versions.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Vaiana

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This does everything it says it will do.Slicing and dicing are so much easier with this. So far I have purchased 4 for gifts because we love them so much.
customer_reviews.author: jolene mackay

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good slicer
customer_reviews.text: Slices and dices well with the exception of some onion. Wanted to bind.
customer_reviews.author: John Michael walker

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome mandoline. Well contructed, solid and sturdy. This device makes chopping and slicing a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but only slicing is easy!  Tough to cube vergetables.
customer_reviews.text: Only the slicer works well for me. Cubing just does not work, no matter how much I try. Trying to julienne some carrots, since I do not have large quantities, ends up easier manually with a knife. Like with all Mandolins, strongly suggest wearing protective gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Failed to simplify cooking prep
customer_reviews.text: Reiterating what others have stated: Disappointed. Blades are sharpe, design is pretty straight foward, but I'm just not having success achieving desired results. The vegetable holder is about useless, the legs tend to collapse with frequency, clean up is a chore to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Muddler3

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I use it for just about everything. The only thing is doesn't do to my satisfaction is dicing tomatoes, everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Flach

customer_reviews.title: Good with firmer fruits and vegetables
customer_reviews.text: My first slicer, so don't really have anything to compare it to. Good with firmer fruits and vegetables. Will slice tomatoes just gets a little sloppy. Read a lot of reviews on this slicer, so first thing I did when I got it was check gap between guard teeth and blade. There is about a 1/4" gap. So not worried about guard coming in contact with the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This item slices softer foods like a regular mandolin but cubing function mangles food
customer_reviews.text: This item slices softer foods like a regular mandolin but cubing function mangles food, incomplete and inconsistent cuts, even with softer foods. Also doesn't cut the last 3/4" of food in the slicer. Will be returning this product and sticking with a regular knife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Haven't figured out a good way to use the hand protector but I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes things much easier. Haven't figured out a good way to use the hand protector but I bought the gloves that protect your hands and they work great. Makes cooking fun
customer_reviews.author: D. Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: The most useless thing I've ever acquired
customer_reviews.text: The most useless thing I've ever acquired. The gap between the steel ramp and the hand guard is so large that a big chunk of any vegetable comes out uncut by the end of the process. I don't think the slicing blade is very sharp either. I gave it several tries ant they all were unsatisfactory. Just yesterday, I tried dicing onions and ended up with mostly pulp. I am giving up.
customer_reviews.author: S. T. Kondrotas

customer_reviews.title: secondhand review
customer_reviews.text: My wife claims that she loves it and it works great. At first, she didn't want to use it claiming I spent too much and she didn't need the fancy deal. Believe me, uses it now. From slicing cucumbers to all the other garbage you can throw into a salad and so forth, it does a pretty good job. With the way the thing comes apart, it is pretty easy to clean. I would buy another for someone else if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: We returned it, so....
customer_reviews.text: We have a 40 year old unit that works better than this one. The old one slices potatoes into larger, more typical "fries" size than did the new one. No matter how I adjusted this one the "fries" came out looking more like shoestring potatoes. The blades didn't seem all that sharp either. In short, it was a pain to try to use so we returned it and HAPPILY went back to our old unit.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dumon PhotographyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Wastes food
customer_reviews.text: For the first 2/3 of what you're slicing, it works fine. What I didn't realize is that once you're down to about 1/3 of the vegetable left, the mandolin is incapable of cutting it. Maybe my expectations were unrealistic. Does that happen with all mandolins?
customer_reviews.author: pdqkemp

customer_reviews.title: Mandolins just aren’t that useful.
customer_reviews.text: As a vegan who meal preps to gain weight at the gym, I was expecting this to save me a lot of time. Unfortunately It didn’t work very well on most of the vegetables I use. Ended up buying a 10 inch chefs knife and gaint cutting board. Now I never use the mandolin.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very solid piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: My previous experience with a mandoline was a Zyliss. This is SO much nicer! This feels like high quality. The blade is extremely sharp. Nice, even slices. So easy to use and adjust. It makes very quick work for me when I have a lot of slicing to do. It is also easy to clean. I love the fold out stands. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Reviews were correct, very good machine.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for doing stews, casseroles and such. Works very well for everything I want it for. I did kind of search reviews prior to purchase and this was worth the money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Miller

customer_reviews.title: very good, have to have some arm strength
customer_reviews.text: This is very, very good, have to have some arm strength. All the adjustment are self contained, no blades to change out for different cutting style. Use the guard at all times! all cutting surface are VERY SHARP. Clean up is a snap..
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bteiet

customer_reviews.title: Saves so much time
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in perfect condition, ready to wash and use for a batch of stew I made the same day. I haven't used one of these before and wasn't sure I could efficiently manage the turns required for cubing. But once I had the hang of it, I was good to go. Easy!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and Results Large food gripping allows normal sized ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and Results Large food gripping allows normal sized Vegetables without nearly the trimming Down. I purchased several always something not quite right. But this is the very best I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Long Time Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: A very useful tool.... But not five stars.
customer_reviews.text: It's fairly sturdy. My complaint is that the leading edge (before the knife) does deflect. It still does the job, and I still use it regularly with satisfaction. But if you're hunting for a mandolin, this is a criteria I did not know about while looking... And this one is too flexible to get five stars.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This mandoline is exactly what I wanted. Especially like that blades are built in and available with the flip of a switch. Curbing function is pretty easy after a little practice. Although I caught a good sale, item is still a little pricey so subtracted 1/2 a star. Subtracted the other 1/2 because there seems to be a small dull spot after only a few uses. I still love this product though.
customer_reviews.author: LMFoster

customer_reviews.title: Great for a fast paced F&B venue!
customer_reviews.text: Needed one of these for work in a pinch. Glad I went with this model. Great model, great product and swell to use!
customer_reviews.author: Allen W. Agard

customer_reviews.title: Mother APPROVED
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mama for Mothers Day.. she loves it. Cuts wonderfully, very sturdy, cleans easily. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Veronika Kay

customer_reviews.title: Mandolin for psychos
customer_reviews.text: This mandolin is amazing. Four stars only because you’re left with a pretty significant size of whatever you’re cutting but it works like a dream beyond that limitation.
customer_reviews.author: Chase B.

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much I bought a second one for camping!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Under expectation
customer_reviews.text: Not as i expected. Its a nice concept but when u actually use it, it seems tobe more hastle than not using it
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my hubby for Christmas and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Voorhis

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Cleans up by rising under the tap
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Cleans up by rising under the tap. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: kjmac

customer_reviews.title: Very well made product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep on the counter when I am making salads or cooking. It is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Laz

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and time.
customer_reviews.text: Did not dice, did not slice, and did nothing that it claimed to do. The blade was so dull that it would neither cut a cucumber nor a tomato. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: DTex

customer_reviews.title: Super Duper
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed! After cutting myself badly while slicing potatoes I decided to look into a mandoline. The blades are sharp, and cutting veggies is fast. I chose the one that cubes and I am amazed that it cuts cubes just like advertised. It is a little bit big for my storage areas, but I'm making it work. I don't think you will be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cellojoy

customer_reviews.title: CAN'T SLICE CARROTS - VERY POOR DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping to return this "adventure", but the return window expired. Guys, not worth the money. I got it to slice carrots and struggled for weeks, so please be aware, you will have about 1/2 inch of carrot left that will fill the gab between the pressing knob and the knifes on the cutter. You can't use this slicer with your bare hand, and if something is gamed in the knives - be very careful removing. So this devices is completely not fit to cut any vegetables as it's designed.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product but
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product but, unfortunately, isn't so easy to use. I've only used it a couple times because of that. By the time you figure out how to use in on a vegetable, struggle through slicing it, then cleaning the machine, it may well be easier to just use a knife and cutting board! I'll try it some more and see if it's just user error.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, slices potatoes and sweet potatoes thin so they come out crisp from the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Professional Level
customer_reviews.text: This slicing / cubing mandoline is professional grade. Easy to use and you get what is offered in the specification. Price is high, but definitely a good purchase based on the functionality and quality of the product
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Eduardo Soto

customer_reviews.title: A genuine pro tool
customer_reviews.text: Performs very well and is well constructed with some clever features.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stack

customer_reviews.title: it did not cube properly. and slices were irregular ...
customer_reviews.text: it did not cube properly . and slices were irregular. was too expensive to not work well.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA PRICE

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money. Use a regular knife.
customer_reviews.text: Today it's been a year since I bought it. Doesn't work. It's a piece of garbage. Regular knife works a lot better. No produce wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M

product_meta.title: Progressive Mandoline , Non-Skid Feet, Slice, Julienne, Cube, 4-Adjustable Thicknesses, Saftey Hand Guard, Compact Storage, White
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Style Name:Cubing Mandoline

Our PL8 Professional Cubing Mandoline is the latest result of decades of slicing expertise and is a necessity in the kitchen. You can slice, julienne and cube with 4 adjustable slicing thicknesses. The blade adjustment knobs provide a seamless change between the built-in straight and cubing blades, eliminating loose blades or parts. Integrated blades slice even the most delicate fruits and vegetables with precision. The non-skid feet on this mandoline fold in for compact storage and it is dishwasher safe for your convenience.

For over 40 years, our mission has been to create innovative kitchen tools and gadgets that make food preparation fun and fast while inspiring culinary creativity. From our thinstore™ collapsibles to our sophisticated PL8™ line, our dedication to providing quality products supported by superior customer service continues to drive our creative development today.

At Progressive International, we continually strive to understand the needs of today’s cooks. Our team includes talented, energetic and passionate people committed to reimagining the kitchen. We strive to pass our passion on to our consumers through our thoughtfully designed tools, layered with our avid desire to go beyond the expected.

Our philosophy is simple: offer stylish designs complimented by no-nonsense functionality. We understand the kitchen is the heart of the home, where families and friends connect. Our ongoing mission is to provide exceptional kitchen essentials that help cooks of all skill levels create meals worth sharing.

Prep Solutions;, Prepworks and PL8 continues to build on the Progressive; legacy by offering products that make food prep faster, easier and more enjoyable.
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR QUALITY: Strength, simplicity and safety inspired the design of our Professional Cubing Mandoline. From delicious gratins to delicate julienned carrots, our Professional Mandoline is a necessity in the kitchen
DIAL-STYLE SETTINGS: The blade adjustment knobs provide a seamless change between the built-in straight and cubing blades, eliminating loose blades or part
WIDE STAINLESS-STEEL SLICING DECK: Extra-wide, stainless steel slicing deck allows food to glide easily when secured with the safety hand guard
MULTIFUNCTIONAL: Integrated blades slice even the most delicate fruits and vegetables with precision
NON-SKID FEET FOR SAFETY: The non-skid feet on this mandoline fold in for compact storage and it is dishwasher safe for your convenience

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars230 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
